Title: Establishes the reclaimed asphalt pavement pilot program
Summary: Establishes the reclaimed asphalt pavement pilot program for the purpose of utilization of reclaimed asphalt pavement in the construction or improvement of state and municipal highways or bridges.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the highway law, in relation to establishing the reclaimed asphalt pavement pilot program; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
